summary: In this context, ethylbenzene is identified as a volatile compound alongside toluene, both of which were screened for their removal by various plant species. The study highlights the ability of these plants to degrade and remove volatile substances, specifically focusing on the comparative rates of ethylbenzene and toluene removal. The mention of ethylbenzene in relation to volatile compounds indicates its role as a target for environmental remediation efforts involving plant species.
